item.title: Navigate to a new page in .NET MAUI
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: ‎ To ease your read, please start from the project containing all the different steps applied so far in this tutorial. To do so, refer to the project setup guide and resume from the sample located in the folder “1 - MVVM”. Hey, you’re back! We’re now done with MVVM and believe me, you did take a big step forward! Today it will be much simpler, we start the creation of the application main page.
